boundary

(
  • times
)
Geometry

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:118

Applies the boundary operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The boundary operation converts simplices of dimension n to n - 1. For example, triangles are converted to lines.

Parameters:

  • times Number

    Determines the number of times the boundary operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

Geometry:

() Geometry

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:138

Updates the meta property of this instance to match the data.

Returns:

destructor

() Void protected

Inherited from Shareable but overwritten in src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:60

The destructor method should be implemented in derived classes and the super.destructor called as the last call in the derived class destructor.

Returns:

Void:

isModified

() Boolean

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:96

Used to determine whether the geometry must be recalculated. The base implementation is pessimistic and returns true. This method should be implemented by the derived class to reduce frequent recalculation.

Returns:

Boolean:

if the parameters defining the geometry have been modified.

setModified

(
  • modified
)
Geometry chainable

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:106

Sets the modification state of this instance. Derived classes should override this method if they contain parameters which affect geometry calculation.

Parameters:

  • modified Boolean

    The value that the modification state will be set to.

Returns:

Geometry:

this instance.

subdivide

(
  • times
)
Geometry

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:150

Applies the subdivide operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The subdivide operation creates new simplices of the same dimension as the originals.

Parameters:

  • times Number

    Determines the number of times the subdivide operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

Geometry:

toGeometry

() GeometryElements

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:170

Returns:

GeometryElements:

Properties

_k

Number private

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:31

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

data

Simplex[]

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:17

The geometry as a list of simplices. A simplex, in the context of WebGL, will usually represent a triangle, line or point.

k

Number

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:70

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

The k parameter affects geometry generation.

k must be an integer.

meta

GeometryMeta

Inherited from Geometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/Geometry.ts:24

Summary information on the simplices such as dimensionality and sizes for attributes. This data structure may be used to map vertex attribute names to program names.

uuid

String

Inherited from Shareable: src/davinci-eight/utils/Shareable.ts:77
